div.p: Mean Scattering Ratio (SR) averaged for 15–18 km and for the month of July–August. ( a) CALIOP observations for 2015 (El Nino year) and, ( b) CALIOP observations for 2016 (normal year). ( c) ECHAM5-HAMMOZ simulation (aeronAMIP) for 2015. ( d) ECHAM5-HAMMOZ simulation (aeronAMIP) for 2016. (Figure created using the MATLAB software).
